results.title: ODI Pre-Summit Training: 2 November, 2015

details.description:
Who is this for? Whether you are a practitioner, project manager, data expert or new to open data, there will be something for you. The day will offer a series of compact workshops, giving you a whistle-stop tour through open data and its benefits.

What do I need to bring? If you would like to get involved in the practical sessions, please bring a wifi-enabled laptop.

Are you interested in joining us? Book now to secure your spot.
details.location: Open Data Institute, Third Floor, 65 Clifton Street, London, EC2A 4JE
details.alternative_title: ODI Training Discovery Day 2015
